seriesJson.title: Poetry in song III
seriesJson.description: This series presents outstanding musical settings of poetry and literary anthologies, integrating the worlds of music and literature.

node.title: Sing about what you know
node.description: This program discusses the value of a singer performing songs that he or she can relate to by experience.

node.title: Awareness to listening
node.description: This program discusses how bringing an awareness to listening will heighten the impact of a song.

node.title: How to listen to songs
node.description: This program promotes a way that it feels listeners can discern songs of artistic value.

node.title: The singer's interpretation of a song
node.description: This program discusses how the singer's intepretation of a song has an impact.

node.title: Expression
node.description: How songs and poetry emerge from a need for expression.

node.title: The demands of art
node.description: This program discusses the need for listeners to respect art and music.

node.title: Purposes of songs
node.description: How songs have certain purposes to best suit the intended expression, like work songs and lullabies.

node.title: The relationship between singer and song
node.description: Additional discussion of the relationship between a singer and the song.

node.title: Songs worth taking seriously
node.description: This program discusses the differences between "real" songwriters and "hack" songwriters.

node.title: Putting words to music
node.description: The value of putting words to music.

node.title: Focus on words
node.description: This program emphasizes the importance of focusing on the words in songs.

node.title: Trained writers
node.description: This program focuses on the elements that help trained songwriters excel.

node.title: Listen as if they were our words
node.description: This program discusses how listeners can emotionally invest more in music to find greater appreciation in the song.
